When HyperCard is running under System 7.1, the long, abbrev, and short forms agree with the formats set in the Date & Time Control Panel. The form the English time returns the time in the form hh :mm :ss: AM|PM no matter what language the system is localized for and no matter what the settings are on the Date & Time Control Panel.
